title: What's an unpopular opinion/position you hold?
body:
Here's mine. 

- In principle, abortions are acceptable at any point

- Circumcision is a barbaric practice practised and supported by the ignorant and probably amoral

- American nationalism/patriotism is as fervent an ideology as in Germany during the thirties and forties

- Morality is relativistic in that a given morality is merely the overwhelming consensus at any given time

- Religion, Christianity in particular, has far too much influence on public policy today

- Capital punishment is a symptom of an inherently barbaric society that yearns for violence

- Anonymous Internet forums, especially game forums, are hotbeds for misogyny and misogynists

- Healthy living (dieting, proper exercise, sexual education, et cetera...) needs to be a core unit in school

- People should need to pass a competency test in order to vote in elections

- Western society/societies are soaked in violent, graphic material, primarily visual

- Western society/societies are far too condemning and silent (prudish) on topics of nudity and/or sexuality

- The right to die should be as fundamental as your right to live/life

- Violent peoples are a product of intolerance coupled with a fascination with violence itself (movies, games, guns, etc...)

- Bearing arms as a means to protect yourself from your fellow citizens is self-propagating and doesn't solve the underlying issues

- Shen need buffs

- Scientifically illiterate peoples should not be permitted, either socially or procedurally, to run for office

- So-called divinely-inspired religious ideology as an argument in support for or against an issue should not be accepted outside of the religious domain

- Absolutely nobody is entitled to automatic respect; it is earned as a person sees fit

- The general population is ignorant, cannot identify their own biases, and subsequently incapable commenting on nor making decisions relating to public policy

- The only difference between a cult and a religion is that an adherent of a religion looks at some others as cults; there is no difference

- People should be able to freely discuss any topic whatsoever without fear of governmental nor social persecution

- Physically disciplining a child is a sign of parental ignorance, and should be considered a criminal offence

- Socialised health care is a fundamental element of any compassionate society

- Racism is an ethereal, abstract concept that simply lodges itself in our brains and can be banished as easily as it comes 

- Mental disorders should be dealt with instead of being a social stigma and being swept under the rug

- Lulu should have never existed in this game in the first place 

- I throughout believe Iran should not develop nuclear weapons

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So, what is an unpopular opinion/position you hold?
